subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic, who will face Kei Nishikori, has recovered from his poor play at two lead-up events. Roger Federer, who will play Marin Cilic, survived match points in the quarterfinals.
snippet: Novak Djokovic, who will face Kei Nishikori, has recovered from his poor play at two lead-up events. Roger Federer, who will play Marin Cilic, survived match points in the quarterfinals.
